long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring the iconic character Kotone in her stylish Persona attire, this Chrome extension brings the unique atmosphere of the Persona universe right to your new tab. Whether you're a fan of the game or simply love dynamic anime visuals, this live wallpaper will transform your browser into a captivating, energetic experience.
